events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store but I want to return it because it doesn't fit and looks different from the pictures.
The system has categorized this issue as a Refund case due to the customer's request for a return and refund.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to assist the customer with their return request.
Hello! I’m here to help you with your jacket return. Could you please provide your order number and let me know if the item has any damage?
Additionally, could you confirm whether the jacket has been used or washed, as this affects the return eligibility?
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new and hasn’t been worn or washed, but the size is definitely too small.
Thanks for the details. We can process your return and issue a full refund once we receive the jacket in its original condition. Would you like us to send a prepaid shipping label?
Yes, please send me the prepaid label. That would make the return much easier. Thank you for your help!
We’ve emailed you the prepaid shipping label. Please send the jacket back at your earliest convenience. The refund will be processed within 5 business days after we receive the item.
Just following up to ensure you received the return label and if you need any further assistance with your refund process.
The return has been completed and your refund processed. We are now closing the case, but feel free to contact us anytime for future needs.
